page.title: 08CLUBS
page.content: {BETCHWORTH HISTORICAL SOCIETY-1977. BETCHWORTH AMATEUR OPERATIC AND DRAMA SOCIETY. {WOMENS INSTITUTES. 4 .LEIGH(2), {BETCHWORTH , SIDLOW, DO VERY GOOD WORK {BUT YOUNG WOMEN DO NOT SHOW INTEREST. CAMPANOLOGY -LEIGH AND BETCHWORTH BELLS CAN BE HEARD ACROSS THE VALLEY. {YOUTH CLUBS,SCOUTS,CUBS,GUIDES,BROWNIE VISITORS- REIGATE AMATEUR RADIO SOCIETY AND A MICROLYTE (POWERED HANG- GLIDERS) CLUB. STOOLBALL IS PLAYED. LIGHT AIRCRAFT FLY FROM A FIELD NEAR KNIGHTS GORSE. GYMKHANAS ARE HELD. {DOMESTIC RESEARCH BUILDING GROUP , A {VOLUNTARY BODY, STUDY TIMBER FRAME {HOUSES PRE-1900.MORE PLACE IS A FINE {EXAMPLE AS IS THE HOUSE NEXT TO LEIGH {BAKERY IN DAWES GREEN OWNED BY KENNY {JONES OF "THE WHO" POP GROUP THAT TOOK {PART IN THE "LIVE AID" WORLDWIDE LINK {UP RAISING MONEY FOR STARVING ETHIOPIA
